question: 値段
sourceMnemonic: The <kanji>value</kanji> is in various <kanji>steps</kanji>. Each step is a different amount, and each amount is a <vocabulary>price</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>cost</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading is the kun'yomi reading for <ja>値</ja> plus the on'yomi reading for <ja>段</ja>. Combine them together to get the reading here. You've learned both of these readings already, so just remember <ja>値</ja> is <ja>ね</ja> because you <reading>neigh</reading> (<ja>ね</ja>) when you see a good <vocabulary>price</vocabulary>.
